Class Election

  • java.lang.Object
    • Election
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IR, OPL, PO
    public abstract class Election
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that every Election algorithm will inherit.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.lang.StringBuilder auditString
      An string builder that will be used to generate the audit file as the election is run.
      protected int totalNumBallots
      The total number of ballots cast in the election.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Election()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected abstract void generateAuditFile()
      Generates the audit file for the election.
      protected abstract void generateMediaFile()
      Generates the media file for the election.
      protected static int handleTie​(int numCandidates)
      Handles a tie between at least two candidates by generating a random number choosing one of them.
      protected abstract void outputResults()
      Outputs the election results to the standard output.
      abstract void runVotingAlgorithm()
      Runs the specified voting algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • handleTie

        protected static int handleTie​(int numCandidates)
        Handles a tie between at least two candidates by generating a random number choosing one of them.
        Parameters:
        numCandidates - the number of candidates that are tied in votes.
        Returns:
        the chosen candidate to settle the tie.

      • runVotingAlgorithm

        public abstract void runVotingAlgorithm()
        Runs the specified voting algorithm. This should output the results to the display, as well as generate media and audit files.

      • generateAuditFile

        protected abstract void generateAuditFile()
                                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generates the audit file for the election.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file was not created successfully

      • generateMediaFile

        protected abstract void generateMediaFile()
                                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generates the media file for the election.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file was not created successfully

      • outputResults

        protected abstract void outputResults()
        Outputs the election results to the standard output.
